name: portfolio-brendan-travis
author: Brendan Travis
description: A portfolio site showcasing some of the various projects that I have developed.

scripts.prepare: husky install && husky add .husky/pre-commit "npm run deploy"
scripts.deploy: sass src/styles.scss src/styles.css && rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && cp src/index.html docs/index.html && cp src/styles.css docs/styles.css

ghooks.pre-commit: npm run deploy && git add docs/
